name: 715 Tactical
text: 15 mins late on delivery. Driver forgot half the order. Came back with the rest of the food ice cold. Called and talked to God's gift to the world "Nate" and was a total d bag. He said, "oh just trying to get something for nothing, I get it". I guess we just let corporate handle this one.

text: They have some of the friendliest staff on board here. Pizza Hut pizza is hit or miss for some people, but it is perfect for me when I have a craving for pizza. There buffet is very well priced and is always stocked with fresh pizza. My go …More

text: Online ordering was easy, food was on time, cooked right and friendly person at the checkout. Pizza was good, not great. Little skimpy on the toppings but hot and cooked perfectly.

text: I order from Pizza Hut here in Merrill once a week. Ive never been disappointed. When opt for carry out the restaurant is always clean and the staff are always friendly.

text: Staff is super helpful and funny. Had an amazing pie! The wings were awesome too. Best pizza in town.

text: This is probably the cheapest place to get food. You can get get a large pizza with bread sticks for like 12 dollars vs almost 30 dollars at any fast food, For about the same amount of food.
